reviews.review: This movie was hands down the best Marvel movie you will ever see. It's so well balance and thought out. It delivers completely and so much more. Thanos is everything you could've dream of him being. Go see this movie. You will not be disappointed.

This movie is defiantly a great chapter in the MCU and it is movie that plays well if you are well versed with the previous movies. It is a journey from begining to end with Thanos at the helm. What comes next we will have to see!

Fantastic. The only criticism is that in the very first scene the camera is quite unstable, obviously hand-held. Fantastic action, adventure, characters, humour, plot development and immense consequences for the series of MCU movies. Must watch!

Avengers Infinity War is the most depressing and dark superheroes movie ever with spectacular action, great comedy, great effects, great characters as always, spectacular score with an ending that will destroy anyone forever
Great movie... very busy but very fun and an ending that just throws you for a loop.

This was literally the worst movie I've ever seen in my entire life. Since WHEN is it acceptable to have the bad guy win? I get for a TV show ending on a cliff hanger is a good idea because you want people to keep watching but that's not how a movie is supposed to work! They set it up to have a sequel which I think is bull. And can we talk about Thanos (the bad guy)? Why did they make it so we would have compassion for him? That's ridiculous. He's evil. There should be no compassion. All in all this was a terrible movie and I'm not even interested in the marvel franchise. It's just a terrible plot and story line. Also, I'm sorry to all the people who were literally weeping. My heart goes out to you.
Start strong right out of the gate, bogs down for a short time, then just assaults you with non-stop action, comedy, and powerful moments.

It is arguably the best MCU movie ever and the best movie I've ever seen in my life and the people who are giving the negative reviews or Die Hard DC fanboys and I would like to say them that after Infinity Wars it is just R.I.P DC

It’s the gut wrenching, pulse pounding epic we’ve expected for the last 10 years. It delivered probably the best villain to hit the silver screen in decades. The Russo brothers have done the impossible and made a magnificent Marvel Giant Size comic book issue of a movie.
